name: hhmet

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, chba))
-| wcel(c1, cnv)
-| wi(wcel(c1, cnv), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, chba)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, chba))
-| wcel(c1, cnv)
-| wi(wcel(c1, cnv), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, chba)))

body.origin:
|- wcel(c1, cnv)
-| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, chba))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cnv), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, chba)))
-| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c1, cnv), wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, chba)))
-| wceq(chba, cfv(cba, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, chba))
-| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wceq(chba, cfv(cba, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈(Met ` ~H)
⊣ c1 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
⊣ ~H =(BaseSet ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(IndMet ` c1)

body.origin:
|- wceq(chba, cfv(cba, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, chba))
-| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cims, c1))

comment: The induced metric of Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
